animeDescription: By 2030, Shotaro's son was in charge of Tetsujin-28. An Interpol agent like his father, he used the aged robot to combat the Pink Mafia and the Franken organization. (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Motonaga, Keitarou', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Abe, Masashi', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Nishizawa, Susumu', 'Episode Director, Storyboard, Key Animation'], ['Aoyama, Hiroshi', 'Episode Director, Storyboard']]
